Howdy!

Hi, my name is Maya! I'm a transportation planner, but I don't really write about that much on this page... Something about building the homepage of my personal site makes me feel shy. I'm a lot less shy in my blog posts. I feel like even that makes it sound weird. Whatever, welcome to my corner of the internet. This is 90% of my web presence and a love letter to the old web.
